metaData.title: Atxona - Quality and natural flavor to the world
metaData.description: Atxona bets for quality by investments in new varieties and advanced technology, ensuring the freshness and natural flavor of our products.

index.features: Atxona bets for quality by investments in new varieties and advanced technology, ensuring the freshness and natural flavor of our products.
index.motto: Our motto, "Quality and natural flavor to the world", is a reflection of every stage of our processes, always with the commitment of overcoming our customers' expectations.

sustainability.parragraph1: We are committed to sustainability, our mission is to protect natural and social resources, respecting the environment and creating jobs, promoting a positive and responsible impact in our setting, giving back to Earth what the Earth gives us.
sustainability.parragraph2: Our vision is to consolidate ourselves as a leading business group producing, packing and trading fresh fruits, especially table grapes with no seeds, highlighting our safety and innovation at a national and international level..

metaData.title: Atxona - About us
metaData.description: With a family tradition of effort, work and commitment, Atxona is dedicated to the production and sale of fresh fruits with and without seeds.

history.parragraph1: Atxona Group history dates back to 1910 when Don Severiano Salvarredi Esnaola and his siblings departed from the province of Guipuzcoa, in the Basque Country, to Argentina.
history.parragraph2: They arrived with few belongings, but full of illusions, hope and with the dream, as many immigrants: of “make America”.
history.parragraph3: In 1,913, Don Severino with his wife and children (amongst them, Guillermo, our Atxona = that in Euskera means “GRANDFATHER”) settled down in Alto Verde, San Martín, Mendoza “the land of sun and good wines”.

tradition.parragraph1: Over the years, and guided by an accurate vision of the future, they decided to focus on viniculture, taking advantages of the excellent agroclimatic conditions that Mendoza offered, subsequently they could specialize on the growing of fresh grapes and on the production, store, packaging and trade of fruits in general.
tradition.parragraph2: The family tradition of determined effort, work and commitment has been handed down through three generations, marked by values of responsibility, dedication and team work.

metaData.title: Atxona - Production
metaData.description: Growing quality, harvesting confidence. Atxona Estate develops and produces vines, mainly seedless grapes and other season fruits and vegetables.

production.development: Atxona Estate develops and produces vines and other season fruits and vegetables.

processes.title: It has its own parcels of vines assigned to:
processes.parragraph1: Production of table grapes with and without seeds for fresh consumption
processes.footer: All our productive processes in the estate have been adapted to new global trends of quality standards, complemented by packing, storage and transport processes.<br class='md:hidden' /><br class='md:hidden' /> We carry out concrete actions on the executing of traceability, preserving the quality and naturalness of our products. Growing quality, harvesting confidence.

metaData.title: Atxona - Services
metaData.description: Atxona Group has a Process Plant, located close to our crops, optimizing the shipping time and preserving the product.

services.transfer: Atxona Group has a Process Plant, located close to our crops, optimizing the shipping time, preserving the product in every stage of manipulation.

packing.title: Packaging
packing.parragraph1: We provide a quality service in the packaging of fresh grapes from our Atxona Estate.
packing.parragraph2: We adapt our packaging services based on the requirements of the fruit commercial destinations (national and international).
packing.parragraph3: We work under a Quality and Food Safety Management System, respecting global standards, which allows us to guarantee our processes, ensuring the obtaining of an excellent product.

cold.title: Cold
cold.parragraph1: We have a refrigeration system with more than 600 m2 covered, strategically distributed:

parragraph2.item1: 2 conventional cold chambers, to store more than 800 pallets.
parragraph2.item2: 1 Californian-type pre-cold tunnel to cool down the fruit in the short term.

cold.parragraph3: Our facilities allow us to provide an effective storage and cooling service, both for bulk fruit and for packaged products ready for dispatch and marketing (clamshells / boxes / pallets).

bubble.title: Bubble
bubble.parragraph: Establishment phytosanitary approved by SENASA (National Food Safety and Quality Service) for processing fruit originating from the Regulated Area, preserving the status of Free Area of the Patagonian Region of Argentina. Likewise, to be exported to countries with restrictions for Fruit Fly.

metaData.title: Atxona - Products Sale
metaData.description: Atxona Group has strengthened its presence in global markets, connecting with the main distribution centers both in the domestic and in the foreign Market.

marketing.hero: We import and export natural flavors to the world.
marketing.international: Atxona Group has strengthened its presence in global markets, connecting with the main distribution centers both in the domestic market, Buenos Aires, Córdoba and Mendoza, and in the foreign market, collaborating mainly with fruit wholesalers from Brazil, Chile and Peru, among others.

transport.parragraph1: We ensure the cold chain throughout the entire process, maintaining the freshness of the fruit from the source to the final customer.
transport.parragraph2: Our customers value both the quality and the presentation formats of our products.
transport.parragraph3: We meet the highest standards in the fruit sector and guarantee deliveries timely and in due form.

metaData.title: Atxona - Contact
metaData.description: Let's stay connected! We have close relationships with both the domestic and international markets. Send us a message and we'll get in touch.

form.success: Thank you for your inquiry, we will respond to you as soon as possible.
